OWNERS.description: User IDs of users who'd own the bot, split by a space.

GROUP_IDS.description: Group IDs where the message has to be sent, split with space.

MESSAGES.description: All messages that need to be sent, split by ||

TIME_DELAY.description: Time gap in seconds between two successive messages.

PM_MSG_1.description: PM Permit message, when someone PMs you.

PM_MSG_2.description: 2nd PM Permit message, when someone PMs you.

PM_MSG_3.description: 3rd PM Permit message, when someone PMs you.

PM_MEDIA.description: PM Permit media, to show along with PM Permit, when someone sends you a message.
